com.twilio.rtd

Interface IPMessagingClient


  • public interface IPMessagingClient
    Represents an IP Messaging client connection to Twilio. It holds the product-level client context.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IPMessagingClient.InitListener
      Interface for the listener object to pass to TwilioRTD#initialize(Context, InitListener).

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(Context inContext,
              IPMessagingClient.InitListener inListener)
        Initialize the TwilioRTD Client SDK.
        Parameters:
        inContext - The Application Context from your Android application. Make sure you don't pass an Activity Context. You can retrieve the Application Context by calling getApplicationContext() on your Activity. Cannot be null.
        inListener - A TwilioRTD.InitListener that will notify you when the service is ready. Cannot be null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • initMessagingClientWithToken

        IPMessagingClient initMessagingClientWithToken(java.lang.String accessToken,
                                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> attributes,
                                             MessagingClientListener listener)
        Initialize a MessagingClient.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - an AccessToken used to register this Client.
        attributes - a formless JSON object representing all custom attributes associated with the local User.
        listener - the listener for thisIP MessagingClient.
        Returns:

        Method to create channel with attributes.
        Parameters:
        attributes - custom attributes associated with the Channel.
        friendlyName - Friendly name of the new channel.
        listener - listener that receives this channel related events.

      • joinChannel

        void joinChannel(java.lang.String channelSid)
        Method to join a Channel. ChannelStatus should transition from INVITED->JOINED or IDLE->JOINED when this method is called.
        Parameters:
        channelSid - The identifier of the channel to join.
